positive.review: Great software! I first tried using this 3 years ago, but I was quite confused using this, but now since I now have a bit of experience with 3D animation, this was so straight-forward. However, it is still beginner-friendly, as I am still a beginner myself. I even made a cool car animation where it repairs itself. (Totally not a reference to my most favorite horror movie lol)

i have only used the app for 4 hours and i learned a lot but i learn quickly, so if you have at least 500 hours to spare for learning to use the app then yea i think you should get it but if you have a full time job or cant spare the time then this might not be the app for you.

i have always been obsessed with animation and becoming really good at it. i even learned i had a bit of talent at the start, managing to do walk cycles that didn't look like poopy in my first month of animation. but the challenge of animation needs a lot more than talent, especially when models have flex decay (fmllllllll). but even with the errors, crashing, flex decay, occasional audio issues and glitches that add movement that shouldn't be there, when it works it's unbelievably rewarding. i've heard many say it's too much struggle for not enough reward, but to me, the reward is there, every subtle motion is a shot of dopamine, every jump or step that transitions smoothly to the next is like a soiree in my frontal lobe. it's something i can hyperfocus on and before i know it, i've been on the software for like 9-10 hours straight. i wouldn't recommend this unless your patient, willing to learn, and understand thaat when you're frustrated, use that time to breathe, and relax, think in your head how you can fix the issue, or look it up online, there are sources everywhere that have nearly every aanser for sfm and it's "issues".

this is really a nice software making different posters and animations. it's like not that hard compared to blender XD

this one is more chill and very old. but still usable
It's fun but very confusing getting to know what everything does

Doesn't work for linux, and sometimes you need to figure out some settings so it doesn't get screwed up, but it's amazing for a free software. Quite beginner friendly I'd say. currently looking to get it working on linux though. Heard it's possible.
Even know it is a very old software it is still very good. It sure crashes alot so 4/5 stars just perfect!

easy to learn and streamlined, but also very limiting in what you can do
cant fully utilize the source engine exactly as advertised either

source filmmaker is a great and free app to use if you want to animate this was really fun to play around with and make some animations although every time i want to change the tf2s skin to team blue or anything else it wouldnt really work and i couldnt really use the f11 button to switch game modes but i think its only because of the computer im using anyways this app is great for animations and you should try it!

Quite possibly the most fun animation program to ever use. It can make very high quality animation very easily. Although the quality might not be as good as things like Blender, it's VERY fun to animate with it and the quality in some animations is GORGEOUS. It is very fun to use it and while it will take some time to learn how to use it, once you learn it, it's easy. Overall, my favorite animation program EVER. And best of all, it's FREE. 10/10.
a really good game that you can animate that can teach you like im new and i played it a bit and im good at animating now try the game is fun and will teach you how to animate

I love this app, it is actually my favorite app on my pc and I rate it 9/10. The only issue about this is that at some points when launching it, the entire window is just a white screen and the top of it says that sfm is not responding, but that is at some points though. I recommend this software to people who like making animations.
very cool, can be confusing at first but once you get a hang of it , its gonna be hella fun// nice community 2

great for storytelling! still getting used to all the editors and figuring out movement but its super fun!

It's fun, hard but worth it and has some annoying problems but solvable "most the time"

Ancient Software that hasn't been updated in years, but that also means that nothing will change and there are plenty of tutorials online to learn how the basics. Amazing for making shitty posters if you're like me, or making masterpieces of animation like any other talented person.
it may be buggy, it may be stressfull but as a beginnig point it's one of the best there it if you just wanna animate what your heart diseries

negative.review: Sfm is great in general. Except that it's buggy as hell and every other click is almost guaranteed to crash it. I often place one object for two hours

SFM is crashing for a lot of AMD users right now. Adding in a single light can cause crashing after the October driver update. 

If you're suffering from this, try rolling your drivers back. But if you don't feel comfortable doing that- Then that's probably a GGs.

Not sure if it'll ever get patched considering how old SFM is. Best advice is move on to blender. You wont regret it.

so bad it does not support my screen size and makes everything small takes 5 hours to learn anything and is not compatible at all
fuck you
i hate this program on jesus and on god but it is an eternity easier to use then blender or any other animation software.
all i see is a screen with words on top that says "files" and stuff like that, i want the old SFM back
I almost finished with posing and sfm fucking crashed again and now everything is fucking reset
Laggy excuse of a program. Embarrassing.
just use blender instead, for your own good
Please open source SFM or fix it this hurts me inside to use

it won't let me use it!

honestly its a amazing software to use but i just recommend blender due to how unstable this software is it crashes 24/7 and loading can take a while if you import tones of custom models maps or sounds it is great for learning basic modeling and animating but i will most likely change my review if they fix the bugs and the crashing
